description: Submit the details of transit movements associated with a crossing

movementReferenceNumber.description: The reference number of the transit movement as recorded in NCTS

vehicleReferenceNumber.description: The reference number of the vehicle that the transit movement was on

captureMethod.description: The method that was used to capture the MRN

captureDateTime.description: The datetime when the MRN has been captured

userId.description: The ID of the user logged on the phone who captured the transit

deviceId.description: The ID of the device that has been used to capture the transit

departureDateTime.description: The date and time of the crossing departure

departurePort.description: The departure port of the crossing

destinationPort.description: The destination port of the crossing

duration.description: The duration of the crossing in minutes
